public class LunaParametersIv
extends AlgorithmParametersSpi

An algorithm parameters engine class for IV parameters.

engineGetEncoded

protected byte[] engineGetEncoded()
                           throws IOException
Returns the IV parameter spec encoded as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING.

Specified by:
engineGetEncoded in class AlgorithmParametersSpi
Returns:
the IV parameter spec as a DER-ecoded OCTET-STRING
Throws:
IOException - on encoding errors.

engineGetEncoded

protected byte[] engineGetEncoded(String format)
                           throws IOException
Returns the IV parameter spec in the specified format. Supported formats are:
  • ASN.1: returns the IV encoded as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING
  • RAW: returns the RAW IV bytes, with no encoding
  • Luna: returns the IV encoded in a Luna proprietary format that is equivalent to the DER-encoded format without the initial 0x04 tag byte. This format is only used internal to the provider

Specified by:
engineGetEncoded in class AlgorithmParametersSpi
Parameters:
format - the encoding to use for the returned IV
Returns:
the IV parameter spec in the specified format
Throws:
IOException - on encoding errors.

engineGetParameterSpec

protected <T extends AlgorithmParameterSpec> T engineGetParameterSpec(Class<T> paramSpec)
                                                           throws InvalidParameterSpecException
Description copied from class: java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
Returns a (transparent) specification of this parameters object. paramSpec identifies the specification class in which the parameters should be returned. It could, for example, be DSAParameterSpec.class, to indicate that the parameters should be returned in an instance of the DSAParameterSpec class.

Specified by:
engineGetParameterSpec in class AlgorithmParametersSpi
Parameters:
paramSpec - the the specification class in which the parameters should be returned.
Returns:
the parameter specification.
Throws:
InvalidParameterSpecException - if the requested parameter specification is inappropriate for this parameter object.

engineInit

Initialize the parameters with an IV given as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING.

engineInit

protected void engineInit(byte[] params,
                          String format)
                   throws IOException
Initialize the algorithm parameters with an IV given in the specified format. Supported formats are:
  • ASN.1: the IV is given as a DER-encoded ASN.1 OCTET-STRING
  • RAW: the IV is given as a raw byte array with no encoding

Specified by:
engineInit in class AlgorithmParametersSpi
Parameters:
params - the encoded IV
format - the encoding used in the IV
Throws:
IOException - on decoding errors
